divs: sighting detailsi was sitting at the computer in the kitchen(which looks into my back yard) reading the news online when the most brilliant and beautiful blue\green light lit up my backyard. it only lasted a few seconds, but it made me feel warm and was the most gorgeous thing i had ever seen in my life. it reminded me of water you see on resort brochures. it was so pretty! afterwards i just felt this longing to see it again. i still feel that way.
trends: There have been 126 other sightings in Indianapolis
There were no other sightings in Indianapolis on or around February 1st 2011
